p@font[size="3"]@html||p@font[size="4"]@html||.content.0@html result=result.replace(//g,'').replace(/.+<\/p>|

.+<\/p>/g,'').replace(/

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##\s*🚫\s*|.*{{chapter.title}}.*|佚名|来源.*|\|.*\<.*\>.*\||.*上一篇文章.*|.*下一篇文章.*|转载请注明转载网址.*|标题.*|http.*

ruleSearch.author: $.author##.*\| ([^\|]+)\| \[.*\]##$1
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var data=[]
list=java.getElements('.g')
c=java.getElements('.content')
for(i=0;i<list.length;i++){
	text=list[i].select('a').text()
	href=list[i].select('a').attr('href')
	author=list[i].select('font').text()
	desc=c[i].text()
	data.push(JSON.stringify({
		text,href,desc,author
	}))
}
data
</js>
ruleSearch.name: $.text
